# AssetInstallationRequest

**Class**

An object that describes, downloads, and installs a selection of assets.

## Declaration

```swift
@objc final class AssetInstallationRequest
```

## Overview

You do not create instances of this type directly; obtain them from [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/AssetInventory/assetInstallationRequest(supporting:)].

The system consolidates download and installation requests; you may obtain several of these instances and call [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/AssetInstallationRequest/downloadAndInstall()] several times without causing redundant downloads.

## Performing an installation request

- **downloadAndInstall()**: Downloads and installs assets not already on the device.

## Asset and resource management

- **SpeechModels**: Namespace for methods related to model management.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- ProgressReporting
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
